pages.text: He will send down abundant rain from the sky for you
and will provide you with wealth and children and He will give you gardens and rivers
What is the matter with you? Why can't you appreciate God's majesty
when He has created you stage by stage
Do you not see how God created seven superimposed heavens
and placed the moon in them as a enlightenment and He made the sun a source of light
God germinated you from the earth like plants
Then He will return you into it, and will bring you out again
And God has spread the earth out for you
that you may travel its valleys as roadways
Noah said, "My Lord, they have defied me, and followed those whose wealth and children lead them increasingly into loss
And said, 'Do not abandon your gods. Never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr
They have already misled many. My Lord, increase these transgressors only in misguidance
Because of their sins they were drowned and sent to Hell. They could not find any one to help them against God
And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever on the face of the earth
If You leave them, they will mislead Your worshipers and breed only wicked unbelievers
My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house as a believer. Forgive all the believing men and women, but bring nothing but ruin down on the transgressors
